## Project Overview

This map was produced using the most simple and minimalistic symbology I could: no labels, no names. You can try and figure out if you know the place just from the looks of it, click to show the hidden text at the end of this page.

## Data Sources and Tools

* Province and department boundaries, settlements, water bodies, railways and rail stations, roads: [National Geography Institute of Argentina](https://geoportal.ign.gob.ar/)

****
* Made with ![](../images/QGIS.png){width=1em style="vertical-align: middle;"}[GIS](https://qgis.org/project/overview/) 3.22.4-Białowieża
